item.title: Installing and Configuring OpenvSwitch With QEMU-KVM
Automating Quagga With QEMU-KVM
item.description: Introduction Some days ago I needed a proof of concept for some routing configuration using Linux that was stuck in my head for days already. So I needed a way to bring up some Linux boxes to quickly to check this. The ONL website proved very useful, but I needed to use CentOS. So I came up with a script based on the mentioned tutorial that brings up QEMU-KVM images with Quagga already installed and configured.
